casebody.data:
Jenniyah GEORGES et al.
v.
OB-GYN SERVICES, P.C., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 29, 2017

David J. Robertson and Christopher H. Blau, in support of the petition.

James D. Horwitz, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39909) is dismissed pursuant to General Statutes § 51-197f.
